snippet.title: Outbuddies trailer 1 2018 (indie metroidvania)
snippet.description: Outbuddies is an otherworldly Ghibli-inspired Metroidvania. Enter Bahlam, a sunken fortress of the Old Gods, located deep in the South Atlantic Ocean. Maritime archaeologist and adventurer Nikolay Bernstein and his life support droid Buddy must combine their unique skills to overcome Bahlam’s hostile creatures, uncover its secrets and find their way home.
